title: Full kitchen in apartment, On Las Vegas RTC bus line, Bad Credit OK
posting_body: ['Paradise Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Large studio and one bedroom apartments', '-Easy freeway access', '-Sparkling swimming pool', '-Siegel Rewards Program', '-High-speed wireless internet available', '-Unfurnished apartments', '-Full kitchen in apartment', '-Bad Credit OK', '-Fully furnished apartments', '-Free utilities included with apartment', '-On Las Vegas RTC bus line', '-Free premium cable TV', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
